title: [GAMEPLAY] Elderwood Bard's W and Laugh is Visually Bugged
body:
When using Elderwood Bard, Caretaker's Shrine (W) will have the model base of the default Bard skin. Also, when using the laugh emote, Bard will stand still in what I assume is the motionless default position for the model assets. (T-model)

1. Use W (Caretaker's Shrine).
2. Observe that the model base is of default Bard.
3. Use laugh emote (ctrl 4).
4. Observe that Bard stands motionless.

Reproduction rate: 100%

I confirmed with other players in a live game that they could see it too, so it's not just me. 

https://imgur.com/a/olSgg

replies.body:
Hiya! Thanks for the report. We have a fix for this in 8.7! 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
